meanings.definition: To mentally prepare or motivate someone.
meanings.sent1: She needed to psych herself up before the big presentation.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to psych himself up before a challenging workout.
meanings.sent3: The coach told a joke to psych up the team before the game.
meanings.sent4: The motivational speaker's words really psych up the audience.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing success can help psych you up for the competition.

meanings.definition: A person's mental or emotional state.
meanings.sent1: Her psych seemed positive after the good news.
meanings.sent2: His psych was affected by the stressful situation at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics improved her psych after a long day.
meanings.sent4: The stormy weather matched his gloomy psych.
meanings.sent5: Exercise can have a positive impact on your psych.
